name: pick_and_prove
description: A member from each group picks a numbered paper from a jar.
The host clicks the number on screen to reveal a question.
Only that group races to find the Bible verse answer.
They must answer correctly before the timer runs out to score points.

name: connections
description: The host displays a series of images.
Your team decodes the images to identify a Bible object or person.
Be the first team to bring the answer to the host to win.

name: holy_hunt
description: The host will announce a Bible verse (e.g., "Matthew 13:33").
On "Go!", teams race to find the verse in a Bible.
Once found, they must identify the key object in the verse (e.g., "yeast" or "leaven").
Teams then search the room for the physical item that represents that object (e.g., a small packet of yeast).
The first team to bring the correct item to the host before time runs out scores a point.
